title: Katy Tur | GOP Refuses to Hold Trump Accountable on Russia: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how Republicans have opposed every attempt to hold President Trump accountable for his comments on Russian election meddling.

Then, Seth talks to MSNBC's Katy Tur about her experience reporting on Donald Trump's relationship with Russia on the campaign trail. Then, exclusively for the podcast, she continues the conversation backstage with Late Night's Henry Melcher.
